verses.verse: O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, for he is <S%H2896>good<s%>: for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Let the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H1350>so<s%>, whom he has redeemed from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>enemy<s%>;
And <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them out of the <S%H776>lands<s%>, from the <S%H4217>east<s%>, and from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, from the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and from the <S%H3220>south<s%>.
They <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in a <S%H3452>solitary<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>; they <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> to live <S%H4186>in<s%>.
<S%H7457>Hungry<s%> and <S%H6771>thirsty<s%>, their <S%H5315>soul<s%> fainted in <S%H5848>them<s%>.
Then they <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble<s%>, and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses<s%>.
And he led them <S%H1869>forth<s%> by the <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, that they might <S%H3212>go<s%> to a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4186>habitation<s%>.
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>!
For he <S%H7646>satisfies<s%> the <S%H8264>longing<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H4390>fills<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H2896>goodness<s%>.
Such as <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and in the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, being <S%H615>bound<s%> in <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%>;
Because they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>, and <S%H5006>despised<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%>:
Therefore he brought <S%H3665>down<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H5999>labor<s%>; they fell <S%H3782>down<s%>, and there was none to <S%H5826>help<s%>.
Then they <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble<s%>, and he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses<s%>.
He brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, and <S%H5423>broke<s%> their <S%H4147>bands<s%> in <S%H5423>sunder<s%>.
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>!
For he has <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and <S%H1438>cut<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> in <S%H1438>sunder<s%>.
<S%H191>Fools<s%> <S%H1870>because<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgression<s%>, and because of their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, are <S%H6031>afflicted<s%>.
Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8581>abhors<s%> all manner of <S%H400>food<s%>; and they draw <S%H5060>near<s%> unto the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
Then they <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble<s%>, and he <S%H3467>saves<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, and <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H4422>them<s%>, and delivered them from their <S%H7825>destructions<s%>.
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>!
And let them <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, and <S%H5608>declare<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%> with <S%H7440>rejoicing<s%>.
They that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H591>ships<s%>, that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>;
These <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and his <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in the <S%H4688>deep<s%>.
For he <S%H559>commanded<s%>, and <S%H5975>raises<s%> the <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>, which lifts <S%H7311>up<s%> the waves <S%H1530>there<s%>.
They mountain <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, they go <S%H3381>down<s%> again to the <S%H8415>depths<s%>: their <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4127>melted<s%> because of <S%H7451>trouble<s%>.
They reel to and <S%H2287>forth<s%>, and <S%H5128>stagger<s%> like a drunken <S%H7910>man<s%>, and are at their <S%H2451>wits<s%>' <S%H1104>end<s%>.
Then they <S%H6817>cry<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble<s%>, and he brings them <S%H3318>out<s%> of their <S%H4691>distresses<s%>.
He <S%H6965>makes<s%> the <S%H5591>storm<s%> a <S%H1827>calm<s%>, so that the <S%H1530>waves<s%> there are <S%H2814>still<s%>.
Then are they <S%H8055>glad<s%> because they be <S%H8367>quiet<s%>; so he <S%H5148>brings<s%> them unto their <S%H2656>desired<s%> <S%H4231>haven<s%>.
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>!
Let them <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him also in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1984>praise<s%> him in the <S%H4186>assembly<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%>.
He <S%H7760>turns<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> into a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and the <S%H4325>watersprings<s%> into dry <S%H6774>ground<s%>;
A <S%H6529>fruitful<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H4420>barrenness<s%>, for the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of them that live in <S%H3427>it<s%>.
He <S%H7760>turns<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> into a <S%H98>standing<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>ground<s%> into <S%H4325>watersprings<s%>.
And there he makes the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%>, that they may <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H4186>habitation<s%>;
And <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, which may <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of <S%H8393>increase<s%>.
He <S%H1288>blesses<s%> them <S%H7235>also<s%>, so that they are multiplied <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; and <S%H4591>allowed<s%> not their <S%H929>cattle<s%> to <S%H4591>decrease<s%>.
<S%H4591>Again<s%>, they are diminished and brought <S%H7817>low<s%> through <S%H6115>oppression<s%>, <S%H7451>affliction<s%>, and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%>.
He <S%H8210>pours<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> upon <S%H5081>princes<s%>, and causes them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in the <S%H8414>wilderness<s%>, where there is no <S%H1870>way<s%>.
Yet sets he the <S%H34>poor<s%> on <S%H7682>high<s%> from <S%H6040>affliction<s%>, and <S%H7760>makes<s%> him <S%H4940>families<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>.
The <S%H3477>righteous<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H8055>it<s%>, and rejoice: and all <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> shall <S%H7092>stop<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Whoever is <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and will <S%H8104>observe<s%> these <S%H995>things<s%>, even they shall understand the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
